content.rendered:
My Calendar

Do you want to check out our podcast, #SystemDotDebug? What about the next User Group event for Seattle Women in Tech? Do you want to know the next time I am presenting for a User Group or at a Salesforce Event? Well this is the place! You can find all upcoming speaking events, my podcast schedule, and more on the calendar here.

Calendly

Groups

excerpt.rendered: Calendar of Salesforce Community events, System Dot Debug Podcast, Meighan’s Presentation’s and other Salesforce related events
